articles.title: Dravid makes monumental 'India vs Pakistan' statement over Asia Cup schedule - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Rahul Dravid reacted to the release of Asia Cup schedule on Wednesday, with India set to play Pakistan on September 2 in Kandy. | Cricket
articles.content: The schedule for the 2023 Asia Cup was finally announced on Wednesday evening, with Pakistan and Sri Lanka scheduled to co-host the edition in a first for the continental tournament. The blockbuster … [+1932 chars]

articles.title: Watch: Harshit Rana's Gravity-Defying Catch vs Pakistan A Stuns Everyone During Emerging Asia Cup - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Harshit Rana took a brilliant catch to dismiss Qasim Akram during ACC Emerging Asia Cup match between India A and Pakistan A.
articles.content: With Rajvardhan Hangargekar's five-wicket haul, Pakistan 'A' bundled out at 205 against India in the ODI match of the ACC Emerging Cup in Colombo on Wednesday. Hangargekar took five wickets conceding… [+1595 chars]
